title: Hong Kong's Markets Regulator Issues Warning Against Crypto Exchange Bybit
description: Hong Kong's markets regulator identified Bybit as a suspicious cryptocurrency exchange and placed several of its products on its suspicious investment products list.

title: Data privacy and security concerns worry nearly half of tech industry consumers: Report
description:
For 48% of respondents in Aleo’s 2024 Data Privacy Report, data privacy and security are considered the most concerning issues within the tech industry.

Consumers in the tech industry have concerns, and data privacy and security are among the biggest, especially in the cryptocurrency industry, according to a report from the Aleo Network Foundation. 

The 2024 Data Privacy Report revealed that 77% of the 2,217 consumers surveyed said they were “very or somewhat concerned” about data privacy and security in their everyday lives.

Moreover, nearly half (48%) of the surveyed consumers said that data privacy and security is the “most concerning issue” currently affecting the tech industry.

Read more

title: Robinhood’s assets under custody surpass the $100 Billion mark for the second consecutive month
description: Robinhood, the Menlo Park, California-based brokerage, has witnessed a significant surge in Assets Under Custody (AUC), marking its second consecutive month of breaching the $100 billion milestone. title: Scaramucci questions Grayscale’s Bitcoin Trust plan
description: Renowned investment figure Anthony Scaramucci recently expressed skepticism towards Grayscale Investments’ plan to introduce a “mini bitcoin trust,” predicting potential delays and a smaller-than-anticipated transfer of assets from the Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC). title: MicroStrategy’s BTC Arsenal to Grow with $500M Raise, Already Holds 205K
description:
MicroStrategy Incorporated has significantly expanded its Bitcoin portfolio by acquiring an additional 12,000 Bitcoins. The purchase, valued at around $822 million, was financed through the use of convertible notes along with surplus cash. This purchase has significantly increased the business’s holdings of Bitcoin to 205,000, now worth more than $15 billion in equity. This jump […]
